For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.essential

You may not be her first
column4: or her only. She loved before she may love again. But if she loves you now
column5: what else matters? She's not perfect—you aren't either
column6: and the two of you may never be perfect together but if she can make you laugh
column8: and admit to being human and making mistakes
column9: hold onto her and give her the most you can. She may not be thinking about you every second of the day
column10: but she will give you a part of her that she knows you can break—her heart. So don't hurt her
column12: don't analyze and don't expect more than she can give. Smile when she makes you happy
column13: let her know when she makes you mad
column14: and miss her when she's not there.comedy

Quote By: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.happiness

He’s not perfect. You aren’t either
Quote: and the two of you will never be perfect. But if he can make you laugh at least once
column5: and if he admits to being human and making mistakes
column6: hold onto him and give him the most you can. He isn’t going to quote poetry
column7: he’s not thinking about you every moment
column8: but he will give you a part of him that he knows you could break. Don’t hurt him
column10: and don’t expect for more than he can give. Don’t analyze. Smile when he makes you happy
column11: yell when he makes you mad
column12: and miss him when he’s not there. Love hard when there is love to be had. Because perfect guys don’t exist
column13: but there’s always one guy that is perfect for you.dear-john
